name: Brace for Impact (boarch)
description:
Play as captain Goose of an airship that got caught in a heavy storm. Throw everything overboard that can be missed to save your passengers lives and safely land! 

Mechanics Explanation:

- Each item has a weight value and a monetary value

- The more weight that is on your ship, the faster you descend

- If your descend speed is too fast *(text shows up as red)* you will crash the ship when the altitude reaches 0m

Controls:

- Use WASD or arrowkeys to move around

- Press SPACE to jump

- Use your left mouse button or press 'E' to pick up and throw items

Developed and Published by:

Red Eyed Blobfish

Art - Mosman

Programming - Niels Gaasbeek

Design and additional programming - Bob Verhoef

DISCLAIMER: the music track is a royalty free version of ‘Ragtime Dance’ from Scott Joplin from pixabay.com
